body.description: This application is designed to help you learn street names. Follow these steps to get started:
body.selectPlayAreaDescription: Use the polygon tool to define your play area on the map. You can also use the search bar in the top-right corner to jump to a specific location.
body.selectTools: The following tools may help you choose your selection:
body.selectToolsSearch: Quickly navigate to a specific area.
body.selectToolsGps: Center the map to your current location (requires location permissions).
body.selectToolsSetSelection: Move the selection to the center of your current map view.
body.selectToolsLayers: Switch between standard and satellite view.
body.startGameDescription: Once youâ€™re ready, click the Start button to begin.
body.guessNameDescription: The game will highlight a street. Enter your guess in the input box at the bottom of the screen. Keep guessing until you get them all right!

controls.guess: What is the name of this street?

cancelModal.title: Cancel game?
cancelModal.body: Are you sure that you want to cancel your game?

errorModal.title: Location failure
errorModal.body: Unable to determine your current location. Please make sure you allow your browser to read your coordinates and try again.

errors.overpass: Your polygon is too detailed. Please simplify it by removing some vertices and try again.
